description.english: Complete the throwing tutorial without taking any damage.
description.german: Schließe das Wurf-Tutorial ab, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel de lancer sans prendre de dégâts.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial di lancio senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial de lanzamiento sin recibir daño.
description.schinese: 在没有受到任何伤害的情况下完成投掷教程。
description.japanese: ノーダメージで投げ技のチュートリアルをクリアしよう
description.dutch: Voltooi de gooi-instructie zonder schade te lijden.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a dobás gyakorlómódját sérülés nélkül.
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial de arremesso sem sofrer nenhum dano.

description.english: Hit an enemy using the lever on the trampoline.
description.german: Triff einen Feind, indem du den Hebel am Trampolin benutzst.
description.french: Frappez un ennemi à l’aide du levier sur le trampoline.
description.italian: Colpisci un nemico sfruttando l'asse trampolino.
description.spanish: Golpea a un enemigo usando la tabla del trampolín.
description.schinese: 使用蹦床上的杠杆击中敌人。
description.japanese: トランポリンのレバーで敵を叩く
description.dutch: Raak een vijand met de hendel van de trampoline.
description.hungarian: Találj el egy ellenfelet a libikóka deszkájával.
description.brazilian: Acerte um inimigo usando o trampolim.

displayName.french: Le Roi de la mise en boîte.

description.english: Avoid Wyke's crates.
description.german: Weiche Wykes Kisten aus.
description.french: Evitez les caisses de Wike.
description.italian: Evita le casse di Wyke.
description.spanish: Evita las cajas de Wyke.
description.schinese: 避免使用维克的箱子
description.japanese: ウィケの木箱を避ける
description.dutch: Ontwijk de kratten van Wyke.
description.hungarian: Kerüld el Wyke ládáit.
description.brazilian: Evite os caixotes de Wike.

description.english: Eliminate an enemy with the rocking chair
description.german: Eliminiere einen Feind mit dem Schaukelstuhl.
description.french: Eliminez un ennemi à l’aide du fauteuil à bascule.
description.italian: Elimina un nemico con la sedia a dondolo.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo con la mecedora.
description.schinese: 用摇椅消灭敌人
description.japanese: ロッキングチェアで敵を倒す
description.dutch: Versla een vijand met de schommelstoel.
description.hungarian: Győzz le egy ellenfelet a hintaszékkel
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo com a cadeira de balanço.

displayName.english: Who you gonna call? Not you!
displayName.german: Wen rufst du zur Hilfe? Nicht dich!
displayName.french: Qui c'est qu'on appelle ? Pas toi !
displayName.spanish: ¿A quién vas a llamar? ¡A ti no!
displayName.schinese: 你要给谁打电话？ 不是你！
displayName.japanese: 誰に電話するんだ？　お前じゃねえな!
displayName.dutch: Wie ga je bellen? Jou niet!
displayName.brazilian: Para quem você vai ligar? Você, não!

description.english: Hit an enemy on the pole.
description.german: Schlage einen Feind an der Stange.
description.french: Frappez un ennemi sur le poteau.
description.italian: Colpisci un nemico sulla pertica.
description.spanish: Golpea a un enemigo con la pértiga.
description.schinese: 击中杆子上的敌人。
description.japanese: ポールの上にいる敵を倒す
description.dutch: Raak een vijand aan een paal.
description.hungarian: Üss meg egy ellenfelet az oszlopon.
description.brazilian: Acerte um inimigo no poste.

description.english: Eliminate a Chinatown enemy by using the lanterns with Terence.
description.german: Eliminiere als Terence einen Chinatown-Feind mithilfe der Straßenlaternen.
description.french: Eliminez un ennemi à Chinatown en utilisant les lampions (Terence uniquement).
description.italian: Elimina un nemico di Chinatown sfruttanto i lampioni con Terence.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo en Chinatown usando las farolas con Terence.
description.schinese: 与特伦斯一起使用灯笼消灭唐人街的敌人。
description.japanese: テレンスと一緒にランタンを使ってチャイナタウンの敵を退治
description.dutch: Versla een vijand in Chinatown met Terence met een Chinese lantaarn.
description.hungarian: Győzz le egy ellenfelet lampionnal Terence-szel Chinatownban
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo de Chinatown usando as laternas com Terence.

description.english: Talk to Alex the gardener.
description.german: Sprich mit Alex, dem Gärtner.
description.french: Parlez à Alex le jardinier.
description.italian: Parla con Alex il giardiniere.
description.spanish: Habla con Alex el jardinero.
description.schinese: 与园丁亚历克斯交谈。
description.japanese: 庭師のアレックスに話しかける
description.dutch: Praat met Alex de tuinman.
description.hungarian: Beszélj Alex-szel, a kertésszel.
description.brazilian: Fale com Alex, o jardineiro.

description.english: Use Bud to throw an enemy into a turnstile.
description.german: Wirf mit Bud einen Feind in ein Drehkreuz.
description.french: Lancez un ennemi dans le tourniquet (Bud uniquement)
description.italian: Lancia un nemico dentro un tornello con Bud.
description.spanish: Usa a Bud para tirar a un enemigo al torno.
description.schinese: 使用 巴徳 将敌人扔进旋转门。
description.japanese: バドを使って敵を改札口へ投げる
description.dutch: Laat Bud een vijand in een tourniquet gooien.
description.hungarian: Dobj be egy ellenfelet Buddal a forgóajtóba.
description.brazilian: Jogue um inimigo em uma catraca com Bud.

displayName.french: Il n'y a pas de Dana, ici il n'y a que Zuul.
displayName.japanese: ダーナの姿は無く、ズールだけ

description.english: Awaken the Zuul.
description.german: Erwecke die Zuul.
description.french: Réveillez Zuul.
description.italian: Risveglia gli Zuul.
description.spanish: Despierta al Zuul
description.schinese: 唤醒祖尔。
description.japanese: ズールを起こす
description.dutch: Ontwaak Zuul.
description.hungarian: Ébreszd fel a Zuult.
description.brazilian: Desperte o Zuul.

description.english: Talk to the space child.
description.german: Sprich mit dem Weltraumkind.
description.french: Parlez à l’enfant des étoiles.
description.italian: Parla con il bambino spaziale.
description.spanish: Habla con el niño espacial.
description.schinese: 与太空之子交谈。
description.japanese: 宇宙人の子どもに話しかける
description.dutch: Praat met de jongen in het ruimtepak.
description.hungarian: Beszélj az űrgyerekkel.
description.brazilian: Fale com a criança do espaço.

displayName.english: He had it in for you
displayName.german: Er hatte es auf dich abgesehen
displayName.french: Il l’a gardé exprès pour toi.
displayName.japanese: あいつはあなたのことを思っていた
displayName.brazilian: Ele estava com raiva de voce

description.english: Don't get hit by the sacks.
description.german: Lass dich nicht von den Säcken treffen.
description.french: Ne vous faites pas toucher par les sacs.
description.italian: Non farti colpire dai sacchi.
description.spanish: No dejes que te golpeen los sacos.
description.schinese: 不要被袋子击中。
description.japanese: 袋に当たらないようにね
description.dutch: Ontwijk alle zakken.
description.hungarian: Vigyázz, hogy ne találjanak el a zsákok.
description.brazilian: Não seja atingido pelos sacos.

description.english: Cross the military base without being detected.
description.german: Geh unentdeckt durch die Militärbasis.
description.french: Traversez la base militaire sans vous faire repérer.
description.italian: Attraversa la base militare senza farti scoprire.
description.spanish: Cruza la base militar sin ser detectado.
description.schinese: 穿过军事基地而不被发现。
description.japanese: バレないように軍用基地を横断しろ
description.dutch: Maak je weg door de militaire basis zonder ontdekt te worden.
description.hungarian: Juss át a katonai bázison észrevétlenül.
description.brazilian: Passe pela base militar sem ser detectado.

description.english: Free the "special" prisoner.
description.german: Befreie den "besonderen" Gefangenen.
description.french: Libérez le prisonnier "spécial".
description.italian: Libera il prigioniero "speciale".
description.spanish: Libera al prisionero "especial"
description.schinese: 释放“特殊”囚犯。
description.japanese: 特別囚人を解放しろ
description.dutch: Bevrijd de "speciale" gevangene.
description.hungarian: Szabadítsd ki a "különleges" foglyot.
description.brazilian: Liberte o prisioneiro "especial".

description.english: Avoid the rolling barrels.
description.german: Vermeide die rollenden Fässer.
description.french: Evitez les tonneaux roulants.
description.italian: Evita le botti rotolanti.
description.spanish: Evita los barriles rodantes.
description.schinese: 避开滚筒
description.japanese: 転がる樽を避けろ
description.dutch: Ontwijk de rollende vaten.
description.hungarian: Kerüld el a guruló hordókat.
description.brazilian: Evite os barris rolantes.

displayName.english: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
displayName.german: Wer einen Freund findet, findet einen Schatz
displayName.italian: Chi trova un amico trova un tesoro
displayName.spanish: Quien tiene un amigo, tiene un tesoro
displayName.schinese: 谁找到了朋友，谁就找到了宝藏
displayName.japanese: 笑激のボンゴボンゴ島
displayName.dutch: De Vier Vuisten hebben de Tropenkolder
displayName.brazilian: Quem encontra um amigo, encontra um tesouro

description.english: Play in party game mode.
description.german: Spiele den Partyspielmodus.
description.french: Jouez aux mini-jeux à plusieurs.
description.italian: Gioca nella modalità party game.
description.spanish: Juega en la modalidad Party game
description.schinese: 在派对游戏模式下玩。
description.japanese: パーティーゲームモードでプレイ
description.dutch: Win een minigame in de partygame-modus.
description.hungarian: Játssz partimódban.
description.brazilian: Jogar em grupo

description.english: Hit an enemy by hitting an item on a counter with Terence.
description.german: Triff einen Feind, indem du mit Terence einen Gegenstand auf einer Theke triffst.
description.french: Touchez un ennemi en frappant un objet posé sur le comptoir avec Terence.
description.italian: Colpisci un nemico calciando un oggetto con Terence da sopra un bancone.
description.spanish: Golpea a un enemigo golpeándolo contra el mostrador con Terence.
description.schinese: 操纵特伦斯击中柜台上的物品击中敌人。
description.japanese: カウンター上のアイテムをテレンスで敵にぶつける
description.dutch: Raak met Terence een vijand door vanaf een blad een voorwerp tegen hem aan te trappen.
description.hungarian: Üss meg egy ellenfelet Terence-szel egy pulton lévő tárggyal.
description.brazilian: Acerte um inimigo chutando um objeto sobre um balcão com Terence.

displayName.japanese: これを持っていてくれ!

description.english: Eliminate an enemy by throwing a heavy object with both hands with Bud.
description.german: Eliminiere einen Feind, indem du mit Bud einen schweren Gegenstand mit beiden Händen wirfst.
description.french: Eliminez un ennemi en lançant un objet lourd à deux mains avec Bud.
description.italian: Elimina un nemico lanciando un oggetto pesante a due mani con Bud.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo arrojándole un objeto pesado a dos manos con Bud.
description.schinese: 操纵巴德用双手扔重物消灭敌人。
description.japanese: バドが両手で重い物を投げて敵を倒す
description.dutch: Versla een vijand door Bud met beide handen een zwaar voorwerp op hem te laten vallen.
description.hungarian: Győzz le egy ellenfelet Buddal, egy nehéz tárgy két kézzel dobásával.
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo jogando um objeto pesado com as duas mãos com Bud.

displayName.hungarian: Fordítsd oda a másik orcád is

description.english: Activate a ping pong combo with an enemy.
description.german: Aktiviere eine Ping Pong-Combo mit einem Feind.
description.french: Activez un combo ping-pong.
description.italian: Attiva una combo ping pong con un nemico.
description.spanish: Activa un combo ping pong con un enemigo.
description.schinese: 激活与敌人的乒乓组合。
description.japanese: 敵とピンポンでコンボを発動。
description.dutch: Doe een pingpong-combo met een vijand.
description.hungarian: Érj el egy pingpong kombót egy ellenféllel.
description.brazilian: Ative um combo de pingue-pongue com um inimigo.

description.english: Complete the game.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu.
description.italian: Completa il gioco.
description.spanish: Completa el juego.
description.schinese: 完成游戏。
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする。
description.dutch: Voltooi de game.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo.

displayName.japanese: ...それともイエス？だが俺が決める!

description.english: Complete the game in hard mode.
description.german: Beende das Spiel im schweren Modus.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode difficile.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità difficile.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo difícil.
description.schinese: 在困难模式下完成游戏。
description.japanese: ハードモードでゲームをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi de game op moeilijk.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot nehéz fokozaton.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo no modo difícil.

description.english: Eliminate a thrower opponent that can only be reached with Terence's aim shot.
description.german: Eliminiere einen Werfer-Gegner, der nur mit Terences Zielwurf erreicht werden kann.
description.french: Eliminez un attaquant à distance qui ne peut être atteint que par le tir ciblé de Terence.
description.italian: Elimina un nemico lanciatore raggiungibile solo con il lancio mirato di Terence.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo lanzador que sólo pueda ser alcanzado con el lanzamiento apuntando de Terence.
description.schinese: 消灭只能用特伦斯的瞄准射击才能锁定的投掷对手。
description.japanese: 投げてくる敵を倒せ。テレンスの狙い撃ちしか届かないぞ。
description.dutch: Versla een verwende vijand die alleen maar door een gericht schot van Terence kan worden bereikt.
description.hungarian: Győzz le egy dobó ellenfelet, aki csak Terence célzó lövésével érhető el.
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo arremessador que só pode ser atingido com o arremesso mirado de Terence.

description.english: Make a bowling strike by throwing an opponent with Bud.
description.german: Mach einen Strike im Bowling in dem du einen Gegner zusammen mit Bud wirftst.
description.french: Réalisez un strike en lançant un ennemi avec l'aide de Bud.
description.italian: Fai strike a bowling lanciando un nemico con Bud.
description.spanish: Haz un strike de bolos lanzando a un enemigo con Bud.
description.schinese: 与巴德一起用保龄球投掷对手。
description.japanese: バドを使って敵を投げ、ボーリングのストライクを決める
description.dutch: Behaal bij het bowlen een strike door Bud een vijand laten gooien.
description.hungarian: Tarolj bowlingban egy ellenfél közös dobásával Buddal együtt.
description.brazilian: Acerte um strike de boliche usando um inimigo com Bud.

description.english: Cross the river without losing any bananas.
description.german: Überquere den Fluss, ohne Bananen zu verlieren.
description.french: Traversez la rivière sans perdre une seule banane.
description.italian: Attraversa il fiume senza perdere nessuna banana.
description.spanish: Cruza el río sin perder ni un plátano.
description.schinese: 在不丢失任何香蕉的情况下过河。
description.japanese: バナナを一つも失わずに川を渡りきる
description.dutch: Reis over de rivier zonder bananen te verliezen.
description.hungarian: Kelj át a folyón egyetlen banán elvesztése nélkül.
description.brazilian: Atravesse o rio sem perder nenhuma banana.

displayName.french: Pas de panique, je suis ingénieur!
displayName.schinese: 别担心，我是一名工程师！
displayName.japanese: 心配するな、俺はエンジニアだ!
displayName.dutch: Maak je geen zorgen! Ik ben een ingenieur!

description.english: Take more than 30 seconds to fix a leak.
description.german: Benötige mehr als 30 Sekunden, ein Leck zu beheben.
description.french: Colmatez une fuite en plus de 30 secondes.
description.italian: Impiega più di 30 secondi per riparare una falla.
description.spanish: Tarda más de 30 segundos en tapar una fuga.
description.schinese: 修复泄漏需要 30 多秒。
description.japanese: 穴をふさぐのに30秒以上かかる
description.dutch: Neem er langer dan 30 seconden voor om een lek te repareren.
description.hungarian: Teljen legalább 30 másodpercbe egy szivárgás elhárítása.
description.brazilian: Leva mais de 30 segundos para consertar um vazamento.

displayName.japanese: これを完了させないの？
displayName.dutch: Wil je deze voor me opeten?

description.english: Steal food from the same opponent 3 times.
description.german: Stehle dreimal Essen vom selben Gegner.
description.french: Volez de la nourriture au même adversaire trois fois d'affilée.
description.italian: Ruba il cibo 3 volte allo stesso avversario.
description.spanish: Roba comida del mismo oponente 3 veces.
description.schinese: 从同一个对手那里偷食物 3 次。
description.japanese: 同じ敵から食べ物を3回盗め
description.dutch: Steel 3 keer eten van dezelfde vijand.
description.hungarian: Lopj ételt ugyanattól az ellenféltől 3 alkalommal.
description.brazilian: Roube comida 3 vezes do mesmo oponente.

description.english: Complete the training with at least 5 seconds left.
description.german: Beende das Training mit noch mindestens 5 Sekunden auf der Uhr.
description.french: Terminez l'entraînement avec au moins 5 secondes restantes.
description.italian: Termina l'addestramento con almeno 5 secondi di vantaggio.
description.spanish: Completa el entrenamiento con al menos 5 segundos de sobra.
description.schinese: 在至少还剩 5 秒的情况下完成训练。
description.japanese: 最低でも5秒以上残して訓練を終える
description.dutch: Voltooi de training met tenminste nog 5 seconden op de klok.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a gyakorlást legalább 5 másodperc megmaradt idővel.
description.brazilian: Termine o treinamento com pelo menos 5 segundos restantes.

displayName.japanese: 申し訳ありません、ボス!

description.english: Hit 5 hostages during training.
description.german: Treffe während des Trainings 5 ​​Geiseln.
description.french: Touchez 5 otages durant l'entraînement.
description.italian: Colpisci 5 ostaggi durante l'addestramento.
description.spanish: Golpea a 5 rehenes durante el entrenamiento.
description.schinese: 在训练中击中 5 名人质。
description.japanese: 訓練中に人質5人に当てろ
description.dutch: Schiet 5 gijzelaars tijdens de training.
description.hungarian: Üss meg 5 túszt a gyakorlás alatt.
description.brazilian: Acerte 5 reféns durante o treinamento.

displayName.italian: Non hai capito? Se vuoi te lo rispiego.
displayName.schinese: 没听懂？ 我再给你解释一下。

description.english: Win all rounds of the three-card game by always choosing first.
description.german: Gewinne alle drei Kartenrunden, indem du immer zuerst wählst.
description.french: Gagnez toutes les manches du jeu à trois cartes en choisissant toujours la première.
description.italian: Vinci tutti i round delle tre carte scegliendo sempre per primo.
description.spanish: Gana todas las rondas del juego de cartas eligiendo siempre primero.
description.schinese: 每次都第一个做选择，赢得所有回合的三张牌游戏。
description.japanese: 常に最初のカードを選んで、すべてのスリーカードラウンドに勝つ。
description.dutch: Win alle rondes van het spel met de drie kaarten door altijd als eerste te kiezen.
description.hungarian: Nyerd meg a háromlapos játékot úgy, hogy mindig először választasz.
description.brazilian: Vença todas as três rodadas de cartas sempre escolhendo primeiro.

description.english: Win the pelota match without letting the opponents score.
description.german: Gewinne das Pelota-Spiel, ohne dass deine Gegner punkten.
description.french: Gagnez le match de pelote sans que vos adversaires ne marquent de points.
description.italian: Vinci la partita di pelota senza lasciar segnare gli avversari.
description.spanish: Gana el juego de pelota sin dejar que tus oponentes marquen.
description.schinese: 在不让对手得分的情况下赢得回力球比赛。
description.japanese: 敵に得点を許すことなくペロータの試合に勝つ。
description.dutch: Win de pelotawedstrijd zonder je tegenstanders te laten scoren.
description.hungarian: Nyerd meg a pelotameccset anélkül, hogy az ellenfél pontot szerezne.
description.brazilian: Ganhe o jogo de pelota sem deixar seus oponentes marcarem.

displayName.english: I think you cheated. Oh, you really think?
displayName.german: Ich sage, du hast betrogen. Ach, meinst du?
displayName.french: Y'a un tricheur à cette table.
displayName.italian: Io dico che hai barato. Ah, tu dici?
displayName.spanish: Creo que has hecho trampas. ¿Ah, sí?
displayName.schinese: 我觉得你作弊了。 哦，你真的这么想么？
displayName.japanese: お前イカサマしただろ。本当にそう思うか？
displayName.dutch: Volgens mij heb je valsgespeeld. O, echt?
displayName.brazilian: Eu digo que você trapaceou. Ah, você diz?

description.english: Cheat to take away a point from the opponents.
description.german: Betrüge um den Gegnern einen sicheren Punkt wegzunehmen.
description.french: Trichez pour voler un point à vos adversaires.
description.italian: Bara per togliere un punto sicuro agli avversari.
description.spanish: Haz trampas para quitarle un punto a tus oponentes.
description.schinese: 通过作弊从对手手中夺走一分。
description.japanese: ズルをして敵から得点を奪う
description.dutch: Speel vals en steel een punt van je tegenstanders.
description.hungarian: Lopj pontot az ellenfelektől csalással.
description.brazilian: Trapaceie para tirar um ponto dos adversários.

description.english: Complete the chorus without missing any notes.
description.german: Vervollständige den Refrain, ohne Noten zu verpassen.
description.french: Terminez le choeur sans rater une seule note.
description.italian: Completa il coro senza sbagliare alcuna nota.
description.spanish: Completa el reto del coro sin fallar una nota.
description.schinese: 不遗漏任何音符的情况下完成合唱。
description.japanese: 音程を外すことなくコーラスを終える
description.dutch: Voltooi het koorlied zonder noten te missen.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a kórust egyetlen hang hiba nélkül.
description.brazilian: Complete o coro sem perder nenhuma nota.

displayName.english: I would have preferred red with a yellow tarp
displayName.italian: Lo preferivo rosso con la catapulta gialla.
displayName.schinese: 我更喜欢红色和黄色弹射器
displayName.japanese: 俺は赤に黄色のタープが良かった
displayName.hungarian: Jobb lett volna a piros, sárga katapulttal.

description.english: Win the airboat challenge by only driving backwards.
description.german: Gewinne die Airboat-Herausforderung, indem du nur rückwärts fährst.
description.french: Remportez le challenge de l’Hydroglisseur en vous déplaçant uniquement en marche arrière.
description.italian: Vinci la sfida degli airboat guidando solo in retromarcia.
description.spanish: Supera el reto del airboat conduciendo únicamente en marcha atrás.
description.schinese: 赢得汽艇挑战，你只能反向开船
description.japanese: 後ろ向きにしか走行しないでエアボートチャレンジに勝つ
description.dutch: Win de airboat-wedstrijd door achteruit te gaan.
description.hungarian: Nyerd meg a mocsárjáró kihívást végig hátrafelé vezetve.
description.brazilian: Vença o desafio do aerobarco pilotando apenas em ré.

description.english: Win the airboat challenge without getting hit.
description.german: Gewinne die Airboat-Herausforderung, ohne getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Remportez le challenge de l’Hydroglisseur sans vous faire toucher.
description.italian: Vinci la sfida degli airboat senza farti mai colpire.
description.spanish: Supera el reto del airboat sin ser golpeado.
description.schinese: 在不被击中的情况下赢得汽艇挑战。
description.japanese: 撃たれることなくエアボートチャレンジに勝つ
description.dutch: Win de airboat-wedstrijd zonder geraakt te worden.
description.hungarian: Nyerd meg a mocsárjáró kihívást sérülés nélkül
description.brazilian: Vença o desafio do aerobarco sem ser atingido.
